Isaac Okoro said that he should be the top pick in the upcoming draft due to the winning culture he provides.

Okoro's agent said that every team in the league, including the Timberwolves, has reached out to Okoro.
“I could see myself fitting in there, playing with D’Angelo Russell, Karl-Anthony Towns. I feel like I could come in there and play my role, do whatever the coach needs me to do in the game and just win," said Okoro about potentially being the top pick in the draft.

Okoro added that he's been working to improve his shooting and ball-handling ahead of the draft.

Immediately before I jumped, I was nervous and a little frightened. All the buildings and hotels including The Parisian Macao looked so short. When I was falling, it was surreal yet absolutely exhilararing. Do you like roller coasters? The most exciting roller coasters are in Fuji-Q Highland in Tokyo. Three of its roller coasters broke the Guinness World Records. The feelings before I did the bungee jumps were different than the feelings before I went on the roller coasters in Tokyo. Right before I rode those roller coasters, I felt absolutely exhilarated whereas right before I made my bungee jump, I felt scared and nervous but of course, bungee jumping was a thrilling experience. Sone peopke are crazy about bungee jumping, whether they bungee-jump from a bridge or out of a helicopter. I'd love to go skydiving one day. It'd be a once in a lifetime experience.

詹姆斯：將會完成《空中大灌籃2》的製作，檔期仍在明夏

在昨日結束的總決賽第六場中，湖人以106-93擊敗熱火，系列賽大比分4-2奪得總冠軍。賽後，湖人前鋒勒布朗-詹姆斯在場邊接受了採訪。

談到自己主演且製片的電影《空中大灌籃：新的傳承》的情況，詹姆斯透露：「當然。我們將會完成《空中大灌籃2》的（後期）製作，它的上映檔期仍然是明年夏天。」

《空中大灌籃：新的傳承》定檔於2021年7月16日在北美地區上映，本片是NBA名宿邁克爾-喬丹主演的電影《空中大灌籃》的續集。

本場比賽，詹姆斯出場42分鐘，20投13中，得到28分14籃板10助攻，全票當選FMVP。

嬲到依加

根據《Breitbart News》報導，湖人昨日的封王戰最高峰觀看人數是602萬8千人，與去年速龍的封王戰1834萬形成強烈對比，收視數字狂掉了將近70%，速龍甚至還是一支外國球隊（加拿大）。

諷刺的是，湖人封王戰收視人口不僅狂輸去年的封王戰，報導也說，昨日美式足球NFL的一場維京人對海鷹的普通季賽就有1200萬8千收視人口，連普通季賽都能狂虐NBA總冠軍封王戰將近兩倍，這也讓不斷被NBA球員抵制的trump忍不住發文了。

詹姆斯今年總決賽有效命中率達到65.7%，歷屆FMVP第一

NBA2019-20賽季已經落下帷幕，湖人最終4-2擊敗熱火奪得總冠軍。

本賽季總決賽，詹姆斯場均得到29.8分11.8籃板8.5助攻，全票當選FMVP。

根據統計，本賽季總決賽，詹姆斯有效命中率達到65.7%，排名NBA歷史總決賽MVP第一（總決賽場均至少20分）.

具體排名如下：詹姆斯，2020年，湖人，65.7%；凱文-杜蘭特，2017年，勇士，63.9%；沙奎爾-奧尼爾，2000年，湖人，61.1%；卡里姆-阿卜杜爾-賈巴爾，1971年，雄鹿，60.5%。

根據《Breitbart News》報導，湖人昨日的封王戰最高峰觀看人數是602萬8千人，與去年速龍的封王戰1834萬形成強烈對比，收視數字狂掉了將近70%，速龍甚至還是一支外國球隊（加拿大）。

replies.msg:
By winning his fourth NBA title, LeBron James has not only just leaped into history, he’s also leaped over Michael Jordan in the heated, ongoing debate over which player is greatest.


James scored 28 points and had a triple-double Sunday to lead the Los Angeles Lakers to the franchise’s 17th NBA title.

There has not been another NBA superstar to lead three different teams to a championship: not Jordan, not Magic Johnson, not Kobe Bryant. Kareem Abdul-Jabbar led the Milwaukee Bucks to a title and then helped the Lakers win five, but no one has matched James.

And none of them had to compete in the bizarre atmosphere of a bubble.

This NBA championship has been like no other and has been harder in many ways than any other. The emotional fatigue of playing inside a bubble for nearly three months is hard enough. Add the emotional strain, the isolation, with no fan-driven energy to pull players out of a malaise, and you have rigorous, unprecedentedly difficult playoffs.

Outside of counting wins and losses, I put minimal weight on statistics — they’re often empty calories. But James has dominated every statistical basketball category. In Game 1 of the NBA Finals, he passed Abdul-Jabbar for the fourth-most rebounds in NBA history. Also in the Finals, James passed John Stockton for all-time assists in the postseason.

Then there are expectations, which I do weigh heavily.

Unlike Jordan, James entered the NBA with multiple mountains of expectations. Abdul-Jabbar, a legend in high school and a winner in college, may have been the only player to enter the league with as many.

James was on the cover of Sports Illustrated when he was 17 and was called the savior of Cleveland when the Cavaliers drafted him first overall. He eventually delivered.

One of the most significant considerations in my leapfrogging James over Jordan is something over which Jordan has no control: posterity.

James has won a fourth NBA title with a third different franchise. Not just any franchise, but with the Lakers. This accomplishment makes James’ connection to NBA history deeper than Jordan’s.

October 13

Latest possible end date for the 2020 NBA Finals.
November 8

Deadline for all early entrants (including international players) to withdraw from the NBA draft (4:00pm CT).
November 18

NBA draft day.
TBD (originally October 17)

Last day for decisions on player, team and early termination options (4:00pm CT).
Note: Some player, team, and early termination option decisions are due earlier.
Last day for teams to make qualifying offers to players eligible for restricted free agency.
TBD (originally October 18)

Last official day of the 2019/20 NBA league year.
Teams can begin negotiating contracts with free agents (5:00pm CT).
TBD (originally October 19)

Official start of the 2019/20 NBA league year.
Moratorium period begins.
Restricted free agents can sign an offer sheet.
Teams can begin signing players to rookie scale contracts, minimum salary contracts, and two-way contracts.
Third- and fourth-year rookie scale options for 2021/22 can be exercised.
TBD (originally October 23)

Moratorium period ends (11:00am CT)
Teams can begin officially signing players, extending players, and completing trades.
The two-day period for matching an RFA offer sheet signed during the moratorium begins.
